label: Material
comment: The material class encapsulates details about the origin or source of raw materials in a product, including the country of origin and the mass fraction.

datatypeProperties.comment: Indicates whether this material is hazardous. If true then
A numeric value representing the mass fraction of the product represented by this material. The sum of all mass fraction values for a given passport should be 100.
The type of this material - as a value drawn from a controlled vocabulary eg textileexchange.org/materials/rm01014 - representing organic cotton.
A ISO 3166-1 code representing the country of origin of the component or ingredient.
Indicator is true if this material input is from a recycled source.

referencedBy.comment: An array of Provenance objects providing details on the origin and mass fraction of components or ingredients of the product batch.
